page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: We have three christian churches in Lapford,with a fourth also represented locally.The{Parish church}is dedicated to ST Thomas of canterbury,and parts of the building date from 1170, the rest from 1480.The finest features are the beautifully carved wooden screen of 1520 and the bench ends of the same date.The church stands at the village centre beside a well_ kept green.About forty people attend services each sunday,with twenty children in the sunday school.The { {Christian Brethren}are the strongest denomination,with about sixty people worshipping regularly in the village.There is a {Congregational} church built in 1800,and about 30 people attend services each Sunday school.
